definition: hand/(formal) to hold/person engaged in certain types of work/person skilled in certain types of work/personal(ly)/convenient/classifier for skill/CL:雙|双[shuang1],隻|只[zhi1]
car/vehicle/CL:輛|辆[liang4]/machine/to shape with a lathe/Kangxi radical 159

sentences.english: The first five months of 2008, the second-hand car totally maintained large increase of business volume.
sentences.chinese: 2008年前五個月，二手車累計交易量大幅增長。

sentences.english: The used car bought by Peter looks the same as a new car.
sentences.chinese: 皮特買的鄢輛二手車看起來跟新的一樣。

sentences.english: At present two handcart website of home basically is information kind with information kind website.
sentences.chinese: 現在國內的二手車網站主要是信息類和資訊類網站。

sentences.english: The two of them bought a second-hand car between them.
sentences.chinese: 他們兩私合夥買了一輛二手車。

sentences.english: I spent a lot repairing the used car.
sentences.chinese: 我花很多錢修這部二手車。

sentences.english: This second-hand car does look a bit old – can you still drive it?
sentences.chinese: 這輛二手車看起來有點舊，你還在開嗎？

sentences.english: " Read reviews of the Jeep Grand Cherokee, and browse "the" list of used car auto.
sentences.chinese: 看評價的吉普大切諾基，瀏覽二手車上市交易的汽車。

sentences.english: How many previous owners does this used car have?
sentences.chinese: 這部二手車有過幾位前車主呢？

sentences.english: Leave your second vehicle parked in the driveway if you have one.
sentences.chinese: 如果有的話把二手車停在私人車道上？

sentences.english: How to give a used car a good going-over.
sentences.chinese: 該如何給一個二手車一個好的嚴格檢查。

sentences.english: If you sell used cars then cross promote with a local mechanic website.
sentences.chinese: 如果你出售二手車，那麼與當地機械網站交叉推廣。

sentences.english: The used car market is the classic example of quality uncertainty.
sentences.chinese: 二手車市是品質不確定性的一個典型例子。

sentences.english: Mr. Arbabsiar is a former used-car dealer in Texas.
sentences.chinese: 阿巴布希爾是德克薩斯州一位前二手車經銷商。

sentences.english: Obtaining of sales training or pre-owned car training by luxury automobile brands.
sentences.chinese: 接受過豪華品牌汽車銷售或二手車培訓。

sentences.english: Here, I will share how to find used car sales in my area.
sentences.chinese: 在這裏，我將分享我怎麼會找到的二手車銷售在我區。

definition: out with the old and in with the new (idiom)
hook (on which to hang sth)/to couple/to link together/to establish contact with/hook/coupling links (e.g. between two railway coaches)
public/publicly (owned, financed, operated etc)/run by the state
